Hangfeng He
HomeResearchTeaching

I am an Assistant Professor in the Department of Computer Science and the Goergen Institute of Data Science at the University of Rochester. Before this, I was a Ph.D. student at the University of Pennsylvania, where I worked with Dan Roth and Weijie Su. Before that, I received my bachelor’s degree from Peking University in 2017.

My research interests include machine learning and natural language processing, with a focus on incidental supervision for natural language understanding, interpretability of deep neural networks, and reasoning in natural language.
